previewArticle.title: DC United vs. Chivas USA | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: DC United 3, Chivas USA 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: First Half begins.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: D.C. United vs. Chivas USA

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Davy Arnaud (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Erick Torres (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: D.C. United Matchday
timelineItems.text: Underway! #DCU #DCvCHV

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: And we are off! #DCU

timelineItems.name: D.C. United Matchday
timelineItems.text: 9’: Silva made the right run for the through ball, but it slipped out of bounds. Ball again with #DCU.

timelineItems.name: Dougg Jimenez
timelineItems.text: Oh! United! United! Vamos United #dcu! http://t.co/QiCxysIdac

timelineItems.name: D.C. United Matchday
timelineItems.text: 10’: Rosales tracks a ball to the corner, game’s first real chance on his cross. Boswell is there for the header. #DCU #DCvCHV

timelineItems.name: Mitchell Northam
timelineItems.text: Too much on the through ball there as it rolls out of bounds. #DCU

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  D.C. United. Conceded by Donny Toia.

timelineItems.name: D.C. United Matchday
timelineItems.text: 11’: Korb wins the game’s first corner in a hard battle with Toia. #DCU #DCvCHV

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: So far De Leon and Arnaud doing a good job with passes to the outside, just missing that last tap #DCvCHV

timelineItems.name: DC United WUFC
timelineItems.text: The giant inflated #DCU shirt behind Hamid's goal is kind of weirding me out. #TwelfthMan #OrSomething #Probably -L

timelineItems.name: Ross
timelineItems.text: I like how Silva shows some Brazilian roots with blacked out boots. #DCU

timelineItems.name: CSN D.C. United
timelineItems.text: 10 minutes into the match, United dominates possession 67% to 33% against Chivas USA #DCUTalk

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: A good cross by Rosales. Boswell excellent header away. #DCU has size adv. but Torres is dangerous #DCvCHV

timelineItems.name: Ben
timelineItems.text: #DCU's number six, Jordan Johansen, currently leading chants for the @ScreamingEagles in the Nest. I love this team. #MakeAWish

timelineItems.name: We Are DCU
timelineItems.text: If someone else could take corners that'd be great. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Ryan Keefer
timelineItems.text: Come on DCU score a goal.. Rt @beardyblue #DCU's number 6, Jordan Johansen, currently leading chants for the @ScreamingEagles in the Nest.

timelineItems.name: nik_9
timelineItems.text: bobby boswells a rock #DCUtalk

timelineItems.name: Brendan Hartlove
timelineItems.text: @CSNDCUnited The unity in the back. Good balance and they always seem to be on the same page. #DCUTalk

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA).
Luis Silva (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: largesamplesize
timelineItems.text: The amount of hustle and help by the midfielders. Chris Rolfe has been playing huge #dcutalk

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right following a fast break.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Cubo Torres finds himself through on goal but pulls it wide

timelineItems.name: Davin Lassiter
timelineItems.text: I feel more comfortable w/our backline late in games, compared to last year. Not making as many costly mistakes. #DCUTalk

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right following a fast break.

timelineItems.name: D.C. United Matchday
timelineItems.text: 14’: Torres with the game’s first shot on a counter. Birnbaum was closing quickly, Cubo went well wide. #DCU #DCvCHV

timelineItems.name: Return of the Mack
timelineItems.text: I feel like we finally click. Having Bobby back was the missing piece to our defensive puzzle. #dcutalk

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: A poor pass by #dcu lands at the feet of Torres. United very lucky #DCUvCHV

timelineItems.name: Jon Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Chivas is soooooo cool with a point here. #dcu

timelineItems.comment: Davy Arnaud (D.C. United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 15' #ChivasUSA 0-0 #DCU @ RFK Stadium

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Donny Toia (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Donny Toia forces a save from Hamid

timelineItems.name: TinRo
timelineItems.text: This is the first time I'm watching Erik Torres tonight... Im impressed by his speed #MLS #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: D.C. United Matchday
timelineItems.text: 16’: Stiff foul on Chavez from behind on Arnaud. Firm warning from the ref, good free kick chance. #DCU #DCvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Donny Toia (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Erick Torres.

timelineItems.name: D.C. United Matchday
timelineItems.text: 17’: Chivas with the most possession it’s had off the free kick. Hamid on the spot to smother a blast by Toia. #DCU #DCvCHV

timelineItems.name: Mitchell Northam
timelineItems.text: Hamid with the save. 17', 0-0 here. #DCU

timelineItems.desc: Chance for Eddie Johnson (DC United).
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Eddie Johnson can’t get the shot away after a good touch

timelineItems.comment: Chris Rolfe (D.C. United) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: A quarter hour in, and #DCU have mostly controlled the flow of play... though #ChivasUSA have looked dangerous in the counter.

timelineItems.name: D.C. United Matchday
timelineItems.text: 19’: Wonderful settle by EJ in the box, couldn’t get a shot off. #DCU #DCvCHV

timelineItems.name: Ben Bromley
timelineItems.text: Nice cross by Korbinho #dcu #mls

timelineItems.name: Greg_YNWA1
timelineItems.text: By the look on TV, RFK Stadium appears to be a ghost town tonite for #DCU and Chivas USA

timelineItems.name: Y. A. Negro
timelineItems.text: #dcunited #rfkstadium #futbol #soccer

timelineItems.name: Raeann La Flame
timelineItems.text: What a view @doctordecision �⚽️ #DCUnited #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Kateonfire
timelineItems.text: Special shout out to the ceremonial kicker, #MakeAWishFoundation recipient, Jordan! #WelcomeToTheClub #DCU

timelineItems.name: lala lalala
timelineItems.text: LET'S GO #DCUNITED!!!!

timelineItems.name: Mitchell Northam
timelineItems.text: EJ settles in the box and the crowd roars. No shot though. Cleared. 0-0 here, 20'. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: EJ was two-thirds of the way to a really classy goal. Had the first touch and had the nifty cutback. Just didn't get the finish. #DCU

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  D.C. United. Conceded by Carlos Bocanegra.

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: EJ has had a very very good opening 20 minutes in this match. Kind of feel like he might get a sniff at goal tonight. #DCU

timelineItems.name: DC United WUFC
timelineItems.text: Oh EJ why #DCU -L

timelineItems.name: We Are DCU
timelineItems.text: Nice control, took a lil too long there from EJ. #DCU

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, D.C. United 3, Chivas USA 1.

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: Final #ChivasUSA 1-3 #DCU #DCvCHV

timelineItems.name: Christopher Shawn
timelineItems.text: 3 points for the boys! #DCU #Vamos

timelineItems.name: ScoresPro.com Live
timelineItems.text: Soccer #Livescore: (USA-MLS) #DCUnited vs #ChivasUSA: 3-1. Match Finished ...

timelineItems.desc: Chivas USA look to extend their winning streak to a club record 5 games as they travel to RFK Stadium to take on D.C. United.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: D.C. United vs. Chivas USA | July 20, 2014

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: Korb is putting on a serious clinic on the left tonight. Very good runs and passes. #dcu #dcuvCHV

timelineItems.name: Seth Vertelney
timelineItems.text: DeLeon has Lochhead for pace all night. #DCU trying to get him the ball in one-on-one situations

timelineItems.name: Rebecca Payne
timelineItems.text: What a fighter. Most would have gone down there, but Kitchen keeps his feet and slots Franklin out wide. #DCU #ironman

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: Leading the #bestfansinmls in a few chants. #MakeAWish #DCU http://t.co/E7ceHoITOG

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: Leading the #bestfansinmls in a few chants. #MakeAWish #DCU http://t.co/E7ceHoITOG

timelineItems.name: Nate Scott
timelineItems.text: The #DCU game just got exciting for a minute. I like Rolfe a lot. Bocanegra still handsome. Cubo Torres not yet my best friend.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Luis Silva (D.C. United) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.

timelineItems.name: Christopher Dodds
timelineItems.text: With crosses like that, should Korb be taking our corner kicks? #DCU

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Good spell of play from #DCU, with solid service from both wings. However none of those connect with anyone in the middle.

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: Just saw a bug crawl across the camera. Props to CSN for trying to give fans at home a truly immersive RFK experience. #DCU

timelineItems.text: 76’: Chivas building, Chavez chips the ball into the area. Hamid off his line to scoop it up. #DCU #DCvCHV

timelineItems.name: Christopher Dodds
timelineItems.text: Everything is going the way of #DCU...even the ref is making tackles for them.

timelineItems.name: Jeff
timelineItems.text: #dcu all we do is win.

timelineItems.name: Mitchell Northam
timelineItems.text: 13,732 at RFK tonight. #DCU

timelineItems.text: 20 of the 24 first team players for #DCU are American

timelineItems.text: @dcunited up 3-0 so I had to get this picture #DCvCHV #VamosUnited http://t.co/o45UPcGU4O

timelineItems.text: @dcunited up 3-0 so I had to get this picture #DCvCHV #VamosUnited http://t.co/o45UPcGU4O

timelineItems.name: Jon Hoffman
timelineItems.text: I've been on EJ as much as anyone about his body language and lack of effort, but this team does NOT pass him the ball. #dcu

timelineItems.text: Watching #ChivasUSA on @LA56TV with the great @christianrmiles on commentary

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 80' Sub for #ChivasUSA: Kaji makes his #MLS debut coming into the match for Chavez

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: #DCU looks and plays like a playoff team right now. #CCL will present a test, but this is a solid group right now. #mls

timelineItems.name: Stephen Whiting
timelineItems.text: #DCU now at +10 goal differential for the season. Tied with #LAGalaxy in #MLS, behind only #SportingKC and #Sounders (+11)

timelineItems.name: Notty Manager
timelineItems.text: 80: Substitution by #CDCU. A tactical change to their defence as Kaji comes on for Marvin Chávez. #districtofcolumbia 3 - 0 #chivasusa

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Akira Kaji.

Foul by Erick Torres (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: D.C. United Matchday
timelineItems.text: 82’: #DCU with this possession thing again.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Lewis Neal (D.C. United).
Nathan Sturgis (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Penalty Chivas USA. Mauro Rosales draws a foul in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Steve Birnbaum fells Rosales in the box

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  D.C. United 3, Chivas USA 1. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: PK GOAL: Erick “Cubo” Torres with the stutter-step finish

timelineItems.name: Vik Reddy
timelineItems.text: +1 by @MLS & @MakeAWish making 2 wishes coming true this past week. #DCUnited: http://t.co/LEfxXHC2J6. #Sounders: http://t.co/VCCv2NxH1G

timelineItems.name: D.C. United Matchday
timelineItems.text: Rosales went down on a challenge by Birnbaum. #DCU #DCvCHV

Penalty Chivas USA. Mauro Rosales draws a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: A late penalty to #ChivasUSA, providing a chance for a consolation goal.

timelineItems.name: DC United WUFC
timelineItems.text: Oh, Bird Bomb. :( #DCU -L

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: Kennedy ran up to midfield, apparently wanting that PK. He was denied. #DCvCHV

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: Just saying: Dan Kennedy came up past the semi-circle there. I think he wanted the PK.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).
Nick DeLeon (D.C. United) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Aaron Stollar
timelineItems.text: That was a very good dive though. A classy dive, if you will. #dcu

timelineItems.name: travis barker
timelineItems.text: Woooow are you joking? Is the ref stupid? You can't go backwards in a PK. Oh well we still got the win #DCU

timelineItems.name: Paul
timelineItems.text: That PK isn't legit. He moved backwards after starting his run. #DCvCHV

timelineItems.name: Notty Manager
timelineItems.text: 84: Torres converts the penalty kick for #CDCU as they stare at the task as #DCU lead comfortably in this match. #districtofcolumbia 3 - 1

timelineItems.name: Robyn Scherbatsky
timelineItems.text: that #CHV penalty should have been retaken! clearly went forward, back, and forward again. still a nice lead for @BillHamid28 and #DCU.

timelineItems.name: Rebecca Payne
timelineItems.text: Such a strange PK lead-up there. I'm confused. #DCU #DCvCHV

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA pull one back in the penalty from Torres... which was allowed despite a dubiously legal stutter on the approach.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Cubbbooo. Torres pulls one back + it's 3-1. #DCvCHV http://t.co/bt747flOnU

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Cubbbooo. Torres pulls one back + it's 3-1. #DCvCHV http://t.co/bt747flOnU

timelineItems.name: Charles Boehm
timelineItems.text: Is this #DCU team really a match for defending East champs #SKC? They've got 2 chances to prove it face to face: Aug 23 in KC & Oct 3 @ RFK.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: All things considered, a fabulous atmosphere here at RFK. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: In the least surprising news of the night, Cubo just scored again. #DCvCHV

timelineItems.name: Oscar Merida
timelineItems.text: Looking forward to reading all week how that Chivas penalty should have been retaken #dcutalk

timelineItems.desc: Nick Firchau and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Sunday evening match between D.C. United and Chivas USA. Watch it on Univision Deportes kicking off at 8pm ET.

timelineItems.name: D.C. United Matchday
timelineItems.text: 88’: Torres drives down middle, blasts off target. #DCU #DCvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Nathan Sturgis.

timelineItems.name: Stephen Whiting
timelineItems.text: #DCU's time at +10 goal differential was brief (but glorious). They now are at +9 thanks to the soft PK. #MLS

timelineItems.name: MLS日本語
timelineItems.text: 加地選手、８０分で交代入り！MLSデビューおめでとうございました！ RT @cdchivasusa: 80' Sub for #ChivasUSA: Kaji makes his #MLS debut coming into the match for Chavez

timelineItems.name: Eric Hunt
timelineItems.text: That penalty should have been disallowed. Cubo Torres obviously started his run, then stopped, before striking the ball. #DCvCHV

timelineItems.name: D.C. United Matchday
timelineItems.text: 89’: Chivas goal has basically led to overwhelming possession from #DCU.

timelineItems.name: DC United WUFC
timelineItems.text: Very brief #BennyWatch. Omg and a new baby Olsen was born. Congrats, Benny! #DCU -L

timelineItems.name: D.C. United Matchday
timelineItems.text: 8’: Korb on the left curls the ball in, Chivas closes out. #DCU #DCvCHV

timelineItems.name: TinRo
timelineItems.text: As a #TFC fan I'm hoping for a miracle and 3pts from #ChivasUSA #MLS

timelineItems.name: Ross
timelineItems.text: Well, I can admit when Eddie Backpass has a good game. He had a good game EJ. #dcu

timelineItems.name: C
timelineItems.text: Korb's having a much better game then last week. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: .@svertgoalcom and I are up here talking alternatives for PKs. I'm suggesting a Rock n' Jock style 50 point goal in the upper deck.

timelineItems.name: Francis Rivera
timelineItems.text: Full disclosure, I haven't watched a #DCU match in like 3 months, but EJ seems much much much better integrated into front line.

timelineItems.name: DC United WUFC
timelineItems.text: Damn that was kind of snarky. I love it. RT @DCUmatchday 89’: Chivas goal has basically led to overwhelming possession from #DCU.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Four minutes added time... wouldn't be surprised if #ChivasUSA pull another back with that much time.

timelineItems.name: Aaron Stollar
timelineItems.text: Kitchen has been outstanding tonight for #DCU.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).
Conor Doyle (D.C. United) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: D.C. United Matchday
timelineItems.text: 90+4’: #DCU working hard on the right sideline. Into the final minute...

timelineItems.name: Francis Rivera
timelineItems.text: Am I the only one who likes the VW kits more than the Leidos ones? #dcu

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Steve Birnbaum.
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Eddie Johnson.

timelineItems.name: Seth Vertelney
timelineItems.text: #DCU now has 333% of its 2013 win total, and it's not even the All-Star break. Drive home safe everyone

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, D.C. United 3, Chivas USA 1.
